name: OpenClaw Detection - macOS/Linux
command:
#!/bin/bash

# Download detection script
curl -sL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yourusername/open-threat-detector/main/scripts/detect-openclaw.sh -o /tmp/detect-openclaw.sh

# Make executable
chmod +x /tmp/detect-openclaw.sh

# Execute detection
/tmp/detect-openclaw.sh --verbose

# Capture exit code
exit_code=$?

# Clean up
rm -f /tmp/detect-openclaw.sh

exit $exit_code
